attributes.action: Ban Islamic extremists from marching on Wooton Bassett and other repatriation points in the UK for purposes other than to show respect for our Armed Forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign if you agree with the above statement.  There are plenty of Muslims in the UK who respect our armed forces and we should remember that too.  The main point is that our armed forces deserve the respect of the whole of the UK, wether making the ultimate sacrifice  or not, this is not about Government Policy.  Members of all our forces go where they are sent, they do not have a choice, we need to use our choices and our rights to support them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
